price: Ancak tevbe edip, iman ederek salih amel yapanlar, işte bunlar Cennet'e girecekler ve hiç bir şekilde haksızlığa uğramayacaklardır.
arabic: إِلَّا مَن تَابَ وَءَامَنَ وَعَمِلَ صَٰلِحٗا فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ يَدۡخُلُونَ ٱلۡجَنَّةَ وَلَا يُظۡلَمُونَ شَيۡـٔٗا

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: illā man tāba waāmana waʿamila ṣāliḥan fa-ulāika yadkhulūna al-janata walā yuẓ'lamūna shayan
